IdeaRequest - Class in edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend
IdeaRequest provides a format for clients to present a content for POST-ing ideas, or a likeIncrement value for PUT-ing ideas through likes and dislikes NB: since this will be created from JSON, all fields must be public, and we do not need a constructor.
IdeaRequest() - Constructor for class edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend.IdeaRequest

mLikeIncrement - Variable in class edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend.IdeaRequest
In the case of like/dislike requests through PUT, mLikeIncrement is the amount by which the like total should be changed (+1 or -1).
mMessage - Variable in class edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend.StructuredResponse

MockDatabase - Class in edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend
A mock database that stores a list of Ideas in memory.
mStatus - Variable in class edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend.StructuredResponse
The status is a string that the application can use to quickly determine if the response indicates an error.

S

StructuredResponse - Class in edu.lehigh.cse216.knights.backend
StructuredResponse provides a common format for success and failure messages, with an optional payload of type Object that can be converted into JSON.
